properties.title: Capanna Bovarina
properties.abstract: Janvier à avril gardienné le week-end où sur demande/ Gennaio da avrile custodita il weekend o su richiesta
properties.description: Capanna Bovarina is a functional, modern wooden building, located in the upper Valle di Blenio close to the border of The Grisons. It is situated on a terrace above a magnificent larch forest and in the midst of a geologically interesting landscape. In summer the region is ideal for hikes, while in winter those on ski and snowshoe tours like to visit the cabin. It can also serve as a stopover when hiking from Greina to the Lukmanier/Ritom area.
